description: Trade Agreement: CETA/WTO-AGP/CPTPP/CFTA/FTAs with Peru/Colombia/Panama/Korea/UK TENDERING PROCEDURES: Qualified. The Department of National Defence Land Command Support System Project has a requirement for the provision of various communications cable assemblies to support current in-service Light Armoured Vehicle 6.0 Engineer Family of Vehicles.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Proposal

### Opportunity Overview

Public Works and Government Services Canada invites interested parties to participate in a Request for Proposal (RFP) solicitation for the provision of cable assemblies to support the Department of National Defence's Land Command Support System Project.

### Product/Service Requirements

The project requires various communications cable assemblies to support the current in-service Light Armoured Vehicle 6.0 Engineer Family of Vehicles. Cable assemblies must be produced in accordance with the specifications provided by Canada, and substitutes for component parts will not be considered.

### Controlled Goods

This requirement includes controlled goods information, and bidders must be registered, exempt, or excluded under the Controlled Goods Program to receive the information, as detailed in the solicitation document.

### Eligibility

Only Qualified Suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement for the manufacture of these cables are invited to respond to the RFP for this requirement. New suppliers wishing to qualify for a supply arrangement under the existing Supply Arrangement W8476-145075 may apply to go through the qualification process.

### Additional Information

* Trade Agreements: CETA/WTO-AGP/CPTPP/CFTA/FTAs with Peru/Colombia/Panama/Korea/UK
* Tendering Procedures: Qualified
* Competitive Procurement Strategy: No Responses to Bid Solicitation
* Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: No
* Delivery Date: The above-mentioned date

### Contact Information

If you are interested in responding to this RFP, please contact:

* Vick, Greg
* Email: [greg.vick@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:greg.vick@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 550-4125

### Documents

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. 

**Regarding the Regions of Opportunity:**

* The delivery locations for this opportunity are in the provinces of Alberta, Ontario (except NCR), and Quebec (except NCR). 

**Tender Closing Date:**

The tender closing date for this solicitation is 2023-12-12T14:00:00. It is the responsibility of the bidder to ensure that their proposal is submitted prior to the closing date and time. 

**Contracting Entity:**

The Contracting Entity for this solicitation is the Department of National Defence. The procuring authority for this solicitation is Public Works and Government Services Canada. 

**Notice Language:**

Documentation for this solicitation can be obtained in English
